title: Vaccine Titers Testing - Direct Labs (USA Only)
cleaned_text: Description Vaccine Titers Testing - Direct Labs (USA Only) Blood Draw is done through Direct Labs and is ordered at another website. Please do NOT order here please go to this link instead: https://store.directlabs.com/rs/Kkin Vaccine Titers Testing: Used to determine the presence antibodies. Titers testing is available for: - Bordetella Pertussis AB IgG - Coccidioides Antibody (Valley Fever) C - Diphtheria Antitoxoid Antibodies - H. Influenza B, IgG - Hepatitis A IgM Ab (+/-) - Hepatitis A Total Antibodies - Hepatitis B Core Ab (+/-) - Hepatitis B Surface Ab, Qualitative - Hepatitis B Surface Antibody Immunity, Quantitative - Hepatitis B Surface Antigen w/Reflex Confirmation - Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Zoster Virus (VZV) Antibodies, IgG (Chicken Pox)
